con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Authorization" value="Bearer ${#Project#SAM-DevToken}"/> <con:entry key="X-PB-TransactionId" value="${=org.apache.commons.lang.RandomStringUtils.randomNumeric(22)}"/> <con:entry key="Accept-Language" value="en-US"/> <con:entry key="X-PB-Shipper-Rate-Plan" value="${DataSource#X-PB-Shipper-Rate-Plan}"/> <con:entry key="X-PB-Integrator-CarrierId" value="${DataSource#X-PB-Integrator-CarrierId}"/> <con:entry key="Content-Type" value="application/json"/> </xml-fragment>

con:config.script:
def httpResponseHeaders = context.testCase.testSteps["Print_Shipment"].testRequest.response.responseHeaders."X-PB-TransactionId"[0] def devId = context.testCase.testSteps["Print_Shipment"].testRequest.response.responseHeaders."X-PB-IntegratorId"[0] String transactionId = devId+"_"+httpResponseHeaders; log.info(transactionId); testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("TransactionId_SAM",transactionId) //log.info (httpResponseHeaders)
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
responseContent =testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Print_Shipment").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) contents=slurperresponse.documents[0].contents parcelTrackingNumber=slurperresponse.parcelTrackingNumber log.info (contents) log.info (parcelTrackingNumber) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("Contents", contents) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("parcelTrackingNumber", parcelTrackingNumber)

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
responseContent =testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("GetTransaction").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) String partnerRate=slurperresponse.content.partnerRate[0] String shipperRate=slurperresponse.content.shipperRate[0] String buyRate=slurperresponse.content.buyRate[0] String amount=slurperresponse.content.amount[0] log.info (partnerRate) log.info (shipperRate) log.info(buyRate) log.info(amount) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("partnerRate", partnerRate) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("shipperRate", shipperRate) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("buyRate", buyRate) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("amount", amount)

con:restRequest.name: CreateTranasaction

con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Authorization" value="Basic cWE6SGpSUUZmY3BqN3FHSmpwNw=="/> <con:entry key="X-PB-TransactionId" value="${#Project#TransactionId_SAM}"/> <con:entry key="X-PB-IntegratorId" value="25876125"/> </xml-fragment>

con:restRequest.con:request: { "amount": "${#Project#amount}", "currencyCode": "USD", "transactionType": "Debit", "clientTransactionId": "${#Project#TransactionId_SAM}", "memo": null, "buyRate": "${#Project#buyRate}", "partnerRate": "${#Project#partnerRate}", "shipperRate": "${#Project#shipperRate}" }

con:config.script:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper responseContent = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Print_Shipment").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) baseChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["baseCharge"][0] totalCarrierChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["totalCarrierCharge"][0] alternateBaseChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["alternateBaseCharge"][0] alternateTotalChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["alternateTotalCharge"][0] log.info(baseChargeR) log.info(totalCarrierChargeR) log.info(alternateBaseChargeR) log.info(alternateTotalChargeR)
responseContent = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("GetTransaction").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) amountP=slurperresponse.content["amount"][0] buyRateP=slurperresponse.content["buyRate"][0] partnerRateP=slurperresponse.content["partnerRate"][0] shipperRateP=slurperresponse.content["shipperRate"][0] log.info(amountP) log.info(buyRateP) log.info(partnerRateP) log.info(shipperRateP)
assert buyRateP<=partnerRateP && buyRateP<=shipperRateP //log.info(baseChargeR==baseChargeP && totalCarrierChargeR==totalCarrierChargeP)

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper responseContent = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Rate_Shipment").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) baseChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["baseCharge"] totalCarrierChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["totalCarrierCharge"] log.info(baseChargeR) log.info(totalCarrierChargeR)
responseContent = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Print_Shipment").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) baseChargeP=slurperresponse.rates["baseCharge"] totalCarrierChargeP=slurperresponse.rates["totalCarrierCharge"] log.info(baseChargeP) log.info(totalCarrierChargeP)
assert baseChargeR==baseChargeP && totalCarrierChargeR==totalCarrierChargeP log.info(baseChargeR==baseChargeP && totalCarrierChargeR==totalCarrierChargeP)

con:restRequest.con:request: { "accountNumber": "${#Project#accountNumber}", "amount": "${#Project#ShortPayAmount}", "currencyCode": "USD", "transactionType": "DEBIT", "authorizationCode": "${#Project#authorizationCode}", "clientId": "${#Project#ClientID}", "clientTransactionId": "${#Project#PrintTransactionId}", "memo": "APV: weight", "buyRate": "${#Project#buyRate}", "partnerRate": "${#Project#partnerRate}", "shipperRate": ${#Project#ShortPayshipperRate}, "currentBalance": "${#Project#currentBalance}", "shipperId": "${#Project#shipperId}", "shipperName": "${#Project#shipperName}", "partnerId": "${#Project#partnerId}", "partnerName": "${#Project#partnerName}" }

con:config.script:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
responseContent =testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("CreateTranasaction").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent)
Double amount=slurperresponse.amount Double shipperRate =slurperresponse.shipperRate Double buyRate= slurperresponse.buyRate Double partnerRate= slurperresponse.buyRate
log.info ("amount: " +amount) log.info ("shipperRate: "+shipperRate) log.info ("buyRate: "+buyRate) log.info ("partnerRate: "+partnerRate)
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("ShortPayAmount", amount.toString()) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("ShortPayshipperRate", shipperRate.toString()) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("buyRate", buyRate.toString()) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("partnerRate", partnerRate.toString())

con:restRequest.con:request: { "accountNumber": "${#Project#accountNumber}", "amount": "${#Project#ShortPayAmount}", "currencyCode": "USD", "transactionType": "CREDIT", "authorizationCode": "${#Project#authorizationCode}", "clientId": "QA", "clientTransactionId": "${#Project#PrintTransactionId}", "memo": "APV: size", "buyRate": "${#Project#buyRate}", "partnerRate": "${#Project#partnerRate}", "shipperRate":"${#Project#ShortPayAmount}", "currentBalance": "${#Project#currentBalance}", "shipperId": "${#Project#shipperId}", "shipperName": "${#Project#shipperName}", "partnerId": "${#Project#partnerId}", "partnerName": "${#Project#partnerName}" }

con:config.script:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
responseContent =testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("CreateTranasaction").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent)
Double amount=slurperresponse.amount Double shipperRate =slurperresponse.shipperRate Double buyRate= slurperresponse.buyRate Double partnerRate= slurperresponse.buyRate
log.info ("amount: " +amount) log.info ("shipperRate: "+shipperRate) log.info ("buyRate: "+buyRate) log.info ("partnerRate: "+partnerRate)
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("ShortPayAmount", amount.toString()) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("ShortPayshipperRate", shipperRate.toString()) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("buyRate", buyRate.toString()) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("partnerRate", partnerRate.toString())

con:restRequest.con:request: { "recordType":"11", "transactionId":"${#Project#PrintTransactionId}", "transactionDateTime":"${DateGenerator#Date}", "transactionType":"APV-POSTAGE OVERPAID", "developerName":"PB", "developerId":"${#Project#partnerId}", "developerRateAmount":"${#Project#ShortPayAmount}", "merchantId":"${#Project#shipperId}", "merchantPostageAccountPaymentMethod":"OTHER", "wholesaleRate":7.860, "parcelTrackingNumber":"${#Project#parcelTrackingNumber}", "weightInOunces":71.12, "zone":"", "packageLengthInInches":14.4, "packageWidthInInches":14.4, "packageHeightInInches":14.4, "packageTypeIndicator":"NonCubic", "packageType":"PKG", "mailClass":"FIRST CLASS MAIL SERVICE", "internationalCountryPriceGroup":"", "originationAddress":"\"27 Waterview Dr,Shelton,CT,06484\"", "originZip":"064844361", "destinationAddress":"\"631 S Main St,Greenville,SC,29601\"", "destinationZip":"296012504", "destinationCountry":"US", "createdAt":"${DateGenerator#Date}", "gcsTransactionFile":"205160", "gcsPartner":"00000017", "shipmentId":"${#Project#ShipmentID}", "transactionSource":"APV", "adjustmentReason":"Size", "externalId":"122", "amount": "${#Project#ShortPayAmount}" }

con:config.script:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper responseContent = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Print_Shipment").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) baseChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["baseCharge"][0] totalCarrierChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["totalCarrierCharge"][0] alternateBaseChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["alternateBaseCharge"][0] alternateTotalChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["alternateTotalCharge"][0] log.info(baseChargeR) log.info(totalCarrierChargeR) log.info(alternateBaseChargeR) log.info(alternateTotalChargeR)
responseContent = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("GetTransaction").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) amountP=slurperresponse.content["amount"][0] buyRateP=slurperresponse.content["buyRate"][0] partnerRateP=slurperresponse.content["partnerRate"][0] shipperRateP=slurperresponse.content["shipperRate"][0] log.info(amountP) log.info(buyRateP) log.info(partnerRateP) log.info(shipperRateP)
assert buyRateP<=partnerRateP && buyRateP<=shipperRateP //log.info(baseChargeR==baseChargeP && totalCarrierChargeR==totalCarrierChargeP)

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper responseContent = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Rate_Shipment").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) baseChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["baseCharge"] totalCarrierChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["totalCarrierCharge"] log.info(baseChargeR) log.info(totalCarrierChargeR)
responseContent = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Print_Shipment").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) baseChargeP=slurperresponse.rates["baseCharge"] totalCarrierChargeP=slurperresponse.rates["totalCarrierCharge"] log.info(baseChargeP) log.info(totalCarrierChargeP)
assert baseChargeR==baseChargeP && totalCarrierChargeR==totalCarrierChargeP log.info(baseChargeR==baseChargeP && totalCarrierChargeR==totalCarrierChargeP)

con:config.script:

con:config.script:
def httpResponseHeaders = context.testCase.testSteps["Print_Shipment"].testRequest.response.responseHeaders."X-PB-TransactionId"[0] def devId = context.testCase.testSteps["Print_Shipment"].testRequest.response.responseHeaders."X-PB-IntegratorId"[0] String transactionId = devId+"_"+httpResponseHeaders; log.info(transactionId); testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("TransactionId_SAM",transactionId) //log.info (httpResponseHeaders)
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
responseContent =testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Print_Shipment").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) contents=slurperresponse.documents[0].contents parcelTrackingNumber=slurperresponse.parcelTrackingNumber log.info (contents) log.info (parcelTrackingNumber) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("Contents", contents) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("parcelTrackingNumber", parcelTrackingNumber)

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
responseContent =testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("GetTransaction").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) String partnerRate=slurperresponse.content.partnerRate[0] String shipperRate=slurperresponse.content.shipperRate[0] String buyRate=slurperresponse.content.buyRate[0] String amount=slurperresponse.content.amount[0] log.info (partnerRate) log.info (shipperRate) log.info(buyRate) log.info(amount) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("partnerRate", partnerRate) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("shipperRate", shipperRate) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("buyRate", buyRate) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("amount", amount)

con:restRequest.name: CreateTranasaction

con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Authorization" value="Basic cWE6SGpSUUZmY3BqN3FHSmpwNw=="/> <con:entry key="X-PB-TransactionId" value="${#Project#TransactionId_SAM}"/> <con:entry key="X-PB-IntegratorId" value="25876125"/> </xml-fragment>

con:restRequest.con:request: { "amount": "${#Project#amount}", "currencyCode": "USD", "transactionType": "Debit", "clientTransactionId": "${#Project#TransactionId_SAM}", "memo": null, "buyRate": "${#Project#buyRate}", "partnerRate": "${#Project#partnerRate}", "shipperRate": "${#Project#shipperRate}" }

con:config.script:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper responseContent = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Print_Shipment").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) baseChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["baseCharge"][0] totalCarrierChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["totalCarrierCharge"][0] alternateBaseChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["alternateBaseCharge"][0] alternateTotalChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["alternateTotalCharge"][0] log.info(baseChargeR) log.info(totalCarrierChargeR) log.info(alternateBaseChargeR) log.info(alternateTotalChargeR)
responseContent = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("GetTransaction").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) amountP=slurperresponse.content["amount"][0] buyRateP=slurperresponse.content["buyRate"][0] partnerRateP=slurperresponse.content["partnerRate"][0] shipperRateP=slurperresponse.content["shipperRate"][0] log.info(amountP) log.info(buyRateP) log.info(partnerRateP) log.info(shipperRateP)
assert buyRateP<=partnerRateP && buyRateP<=shipperRateP //log.info(baseChargeR==baseChargeP && totalCarrierChargeR==totalCarrierChargeP)

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper responseContent = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Rate_Shipment").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) baseChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["baseCharge"] totalCarrierChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["totalCarrierCharge"] log.info(baseChargeR) log.info(totalCarrierChargeR)
responseContent = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Print_Shipment").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) baseChargeP=slurperresponse.rates["baseCharge"] totalCarrierChargeP=slurperresponse.rates["totalCarrierCharge"] log.info(baseChargeP) log.info(totalCarrierChargeP)
assert baseChargeR==baseChargeP && totalCarrierChargeR==totalCarrierChargeP log.info(baseChargeR==baseChargeP && totalCarrierChargeR==totalCarrierChargeP)

con:restRequest.name: Print_Shipment

con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Authorization" value="Bearer ${#Project#SAM-DevToken}"/> <con:entry key="X-PB-TransactionId" value="${=org.apache.commons.lang.RandomStringUtils.randomNumeric(15)}"/> <con:entry key="Accept-Language" value="en-US"/> <con:entry key="X-PB-Shipper-Rate-Plan" value="${DataSource#X-PB-Shipper-Rate-Plan}"/> <con:entry key="X-PB-Integrator-CarrierId" value="${DataSource#X-PB-Integrator-CarrierId}"/> <con:entry key="Content-Type" value="application/json"/> </xml-fragment>

con:config.script:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
responseContent =testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("GetTransaction").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) String partnerRate=slurperresponse.content.partnerRate[0] String shipperRate=slurperresponse.content.shipperRate[0] String buyRate=slurperresponse.content.buyRate[0] String amount=slurperresponse.content.amount[0] log.info (partnerRate) log.info (shipperRate) log.info(buyRate) log.info(amount) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("partnerRate", partnerRate) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("shipperRate", shipperRate) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("buyRate", buyRate) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("amount", amount)

con:restRequest.name: CreateTranasaction

con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Authorization" value="Basic cWE6SGpSUUZmY3BqN3FHSmpwNw=="/> <con:entry key="X-PB-TransactionId" value="${#Project#TransactionId_SAM}"/> <con:entry key="X-PB-IntegratorId" value="25876125"/> </xml-fragment>

con:restRequest.con:request: { "amount": "${#Project#amount}", "currencyCode": "USD", "transactionType": "Debit", "clientTransactionId": "${#Project#TransactionId_SAM}", "memo": null, "buyRate": "${#Project#buyRate}", "partnerRate": "${#Project#partnerRate}", "shipperRate": "${#Project#shipperRate}" }

con:config.script:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper responseContent = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Print_Shipment").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) baseChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["baseCharge"][0] totalCarrierChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["totalCarrierCharge"][0] alternateBaseChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["alternateBaseCharge"][0] alternateTotalChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["alternateTotalCharge"][0] log.info(baseChargeR) log.info(totalCarrierChargeR) log.info(alternateBaseChargeR) log.info(alternateTotalChargeR)
responseContent = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("GetTransaction").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) amountP=slurperresponse.content["amount"][0] buyRateP=slurperresponse.content["buyRate"][0] partnerRateP=slurperresponse.content["partnerRate"][0] shipperRateP=slurperresponse.content["shipperRate"][0] log.info(amountP) log.info(buyRateP) log.info(partnerRateP) log.info(shipperRateP)
assert buyRateP<=partnerRateP && buyRateP<=shipperRateP //log.info(baseChargeR==baseChargeP && totalCarrierChargeR==totalCarrierChargeP)

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper responseContent = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Rate_Shipment").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) baseChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["baseCharge"] totalCarrierChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["totalCarrierCharge"] log.info(baseChargeR) log.info(totalCarrierChargeR)
responseContent = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Print_Shipment").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) baseChargeP=slurperresponse.rates["baseCharge"] totalCarrierChargeP=slurperresponse.rates["totalCarrierCharge"] log.info(baseChargeP) log.info(totalCarrierChargeP)
assert baseChargeR==baseChargeP && totalCarrierChargeR==totalCarrierChargeP log.info(baseChargeR==baseChargeP && totalCarrierChargeR==totalCarrierChargeP)

con:config.script:
def httpResponseHeaders = context.testCase.testSteps["Print_Shipment"].testRequest.response.responseHeaders."X-PB-TransactionId"[0] def devId = context.testCase.testSteps["Print_Shipment"].testRequest.response.responseHeaders."X-PB-IntegratorId"[0] String transactionId = devId+"_"+httpResponseHeaders; log.info(transactionId); testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("TransactionId_SAM",transactionId) //log.info (httpResponseHeaders)
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
responseContent =testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Print_Shipment").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) contents=slurperresponse.documents[0].contents parcelTrackingNumber=slurperresponse.parcelTrackingNumber log.info (contents) log.info (parcelTrackingNumber) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("Contents", contents) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("parcelTrackingNumber", parcelTrackingNumber)

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper responseContent = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Print_Shipment").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) baseChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["baseCharge"][0] totalCarrierChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["totalCarrierCharge"][0] alternateBaseChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["alternateBaseCharge"][0] alternateTotalChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["alternateTotalCharge"][0] log.info(baseChargeR) log.info(totalCarrierChargeR) log.info(alternateBaseChargeR) log.info(alternateTotalChargeR)
responseContent = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("GetTransaction").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) amountP=slurperresponse.content["amount"][0] buyRateP=slurperresponse.content["buyRate"][0] partnerRateP=slurperresponse.content["partnerRate"][0] shipperRateP=slurperresponse.content["shipperRate"][0] log.info(amountP) log.info(buyRateP) log.info(partnerRateP) log.info(shipperRateP)
assert buyRateP<=partnerRateP && buyRateP<=shipperRateP //log.info(baseChargeR==baseChargeP && totalCarrierChargeR==totalCarrierChargeP)

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper responseContent = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Rate_Shipment").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) baseChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["baseCharge"] totalCarrierChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["totalCarrierCharge"] log.info(baseChargeR) log.info(totalCarrierChargeR)
responseContent = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Print_Shipment").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) baseChargeP=slurperresponse.rates["baseCharge"] totalCarrierChargeP=slurperresponse.rates["totalCarrierCharge"] log.info(baseChargeP) log.info(totalCarrierChargeP)
assert baseChargeR==baseChargeP && totalCarrierChargeR==totalCarrierChargeP log.info(baseChargeR==baseChargeP && totalCarrierChargeR==totalCarrierChargeP)

testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("Today",Today) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("StartDate",StartDate) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("LastWeek",LastWeek) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("EndDate",EndDate)

con:restRequest.name: Print_Shipment

con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Authorization" value="Bearer ${#Project#SAM-DevToken}"/> <con:entry key="X-PB-TransactionId" value="${=org.apache.commons.lang.RandomStringUtils.randomNumeric(15)}"/> <con:entry key="Accept-Language" value="en-US"/> <con:entry key="X-PB-Shipper-Rate-Plan" value="${DataSource#X-PB-Shipper-Rate-Plan}"/> <con:entry key="X-PB-Integrator-CarrierId" value="${DataSource#X-PB-Integrator-CarrierId}"/> <con:entry key="Content-Type" value="application/json"/> </xml-fragment>

con:config.script:
def httpResponseHeaders = context.testCase.testSteps["Print_Shipment"].testRequest.response.responseHeaders."X-PB-TransactionId"[0] def devId = context.testCase.testSteps["Print_Shipment"].testRequest.response.responseHeaders."X-PB-IntegratorId"[0] String transactionId = devId+"_"+httpResponseHeaders; log.info(transactionId); testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("TransactionId_SAM",transactionId) //log.info (httpResponseHeaders)
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
responseContent =testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Print_Shipment").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) def con = context.expand( '${Print_Shipment#Response#$[\'documents\'][0][\'pages\'][0][\'contents\']}' ) contents=slurperresponse.documents[0].contents parcelTrackingNumber=slurperresponse.parcelTrackingNumber log.info ("contents: "+ con) log.info ( "ParcelTrackingNumber: " + parcelTrackingNumber) //testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("Contents", contents) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("Contents", con) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("parcelTrackingNumber", parcelTrackingNumber)

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
responseContent =testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("GetTransaction").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) String partnerRate=slurperresponse.content.partnerRate[0] String shipperRate=slurperresponse.content.shipperRate[0] String buyRate=slurperresponse.content.buyRate[0] String amount=slurperresponse.content.amount[0] log.info (partnerRate) log.info (shipperRate) log.info(buyRate) log.info(amount) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("partnerRate", partnerRate) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("shipperRate", shipperRate) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("buyRate", buyRate) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("amount", amount)

con:restRequest.name: CreateTranasaction

con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Authorization" value="Basic cWE6SGpSUUZmY3BqN3FHSmpwNw=="/> <con:entry key="X-PB-TransactionId" value="${#Project#TransactionId_SAM}"/> <con:entry key="X-PB-IntegratorId" value="25876125"/> </xml-fragment>

con:restRequest.con:request: { "amount": "${#Project#amount}", "currencyCode": "USD", "transactionType": "Debit", "clientTransactionId": "${#Project#TransactionId_SAM}", "memo": null, "buyRate": "${#Project#buyRate}", "partnerRate": "${#Project#partnerRate}", "shipperRate": "${#Project#shipperRate}" }

con:config.script:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper responseContent = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Print_Shipment").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) baseChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["baseCharge"][0] totalCarrierChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["totalCarrierCharge"][0] alternateBaseChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["alternateBaseCharge"][0] alternateTotalChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["alternateTotalCharge"][0] log.info(baseChargeR) log.info(totalCarrierChargeR) log.info(alternateBaseChargeR) log.info(alternateTotalChargeR)
responseContent = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("GetTransaction").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) amountP=slurperresponse.content["amount"][0] buyRateP=slurperresponse.content["buyRate"][0] partnerRateP=slurperresponse.content["partnerRate"][0] shipperRateP=slurperresponse.content["shipperRate"][0] log.info(amountP) log.info(buyRateP) log.info(partnerRateP) log.info(shipperRateP)
assert buyRateP<=partnerRateP && buyRateP<=shipperRateP //log.info(baseChargeR==baseChargeP && totalCarrierChargeR==totalCarrierChargeP)

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper responseContent = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Rate_Shipment").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) baseChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["baseCharge"] totalCarrierChargeR=slurperresponse.rates["totalCarrierCharge"] log.info(baseChargeR) log.info(totalCarrierChargeR)
responseContent = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Print_Shipment").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) baseChargeP=slurperresponse.rates["baseCharge"] totalCarrierChargeP=slurperresponse.rates["totalCarrierCharge"] log.info(baseChargeP) log.info(totalCarrierChargeP)
assert baseChargeR==baseChargeP && totalCarrierChargeR==totalCarrierChargeP log.info(baseChargeR==baseChargeP && totalCarrierChargeR==totalCarrierChargeP)
